amendment.description: Amendment provides for four new Federal district judges for the middle district of Florida, three for Arizona, and two for Nevada.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 18 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to provide four new Federal district judges for the middle district of Florida, three for Arizona, and two for Nevada.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goss amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
